name: Dazing Assault
description: You can daze foes with wild attacks.
prerequisites: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +11
benefit: You can choose to take a â€“5 penalty on all melee attack rolls and combat maneuver checks to daze opponents you hit with your melee attacks for 1 round, in addition to the normal damage dealt by the attack.
